CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 23, 1957, pg. 31 reads: "Good Time - Mrs. Marjorie Stewart Joyner, left, national supervisor of the Madame C.J. Walker Company, seems to be having a good time at The Courier Home Service Fair as she is introduced by Mrs. Daisy Lampkin, Courier vice president. The fair, which opened at Syria Mosque Tuesday, will close tonight (Thursday, March 21). - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Marjorie Stewart Joyner and Daisy Lampkin standing at microphone, in Westinghouse appliance display with Oakland Furniture Company banner overhead, at 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair, Syria Mosque
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Lampkin, Daisy E. (Daisy Elizabeth), 1882-1965.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
